text: I'm thinking about applying for illustration, since i was told i could do animation during the course too
thanks for doing this by the way, what you've told me so far about career paths has been helpful

Hi Jane. I’m really happy to help. It’s a stressful and confusing time for you, but try to stay focussed on what you enjoy as it’s what you are passionate about and will be mean you’re more likely to have the drive to succeed in it.  Your love of it will also come over in your work and in person when you interview for courses and jobs in the future and as an employer that is what I look for.  Do you have an idea of where you’d like to study?  The courses can be quite different so that will help me do some homework for you. :slightly_smiling_face:
It would also be good to know what you like to do in your spare time.  If you love animation and illustration, what / who do you like / admire?
